root.name: Farming Simulator 2013
root.description: FeaturesCareer ModeUser Created MODSCo-Op Online MultilayerSteam AchievementsSteam Cloud SupportGamepad and Steering Wheel SupportSystem RequirementsPC MinimumOS: Windows XP SP3/Windows Vista SP2/Windows 7Processor: AMD/Intel 2.0GHZMemory: 1024MBGraphics: 256MB of Video Memory ATI Radeon x1600/Nvidia Geforce 7600/Intel HD2000 or higher.Hard Drive: 2 GB Storage Required for InstallationAdditional: Internet Connection Required for Activation and Online Modes.MAC MinimumOS: Mac OS X 10.6.1/10.7.1/10.8.1Processor: AMD/INTEL 2.0GHSMemory: 1024MBGraphics: 256MB of Video Memory ATI Radeon x1600/Nvidia Geforce 7600/Intel HD2000 or higher.Hard Drive: 2 GB Storage Required for InstallationAdditional: Internet Connection Required for Activation and Online Modes.
